apcs.project.structure

Class NetworkWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.world.World<apcs.project.structure.Piece>
      • apcs.project.structure.CheckerWorld
        • apcs.project.structure.NetworkWorld

  • public class NetworkWorld
extends apcs.project.structure.CheckerWorld
    This class is an extension of CheckerWorld that explicitly deals with network games
    Version:
    May 26, 2014
    Author:
    Darren Yang

      • locationClicked

        public void locationClicked(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc,
                   boolean local)
        Processes a click on the grid. If it is local, it sends it to the opponent.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location clicked
        local - whether or not the click was local
